application.doc: Retrieve the instances for a particular remote syslog forwarding source

param.name: source_name
param.doc: The name of the log source. It can be either webseal, azn_server or runtime_logs.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve the instances for a particular remote syslog forwarding source
method.doc: The system provides the ability to forward entries from local log files to a remote syslog server. To retrieve the list of potential log file sources issue a HTTP GET request against the remote syslog forwarding instances resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: sources
param.doc: The name of a log file source.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
